thread.section_title: Clothes2order.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.clothes2order.com | 7 of 316
thread.title: Peter

author: Peter
title: Peter
text:
Right from the outset C2O were a great help, assigning a dedicated customer support person (Jamie) who made the whole process of ordering very simple. A couple of very minor issues arose, and these were dealt with speedily and to our full satisfaction. I would have no reservation about wholeheartedly recommending C2O to anyone wanting a high-quality garment personalised to their needs. Thanks Jamie,
Peter, Crowthorne Musical Players
